content.rendered:
X-Ray Technologist | Tulsa, Oklahoma
    • Full-Time days, Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
    • Responsible for producing diagnostic images of patients within the clinic
    • ARRT Registered Radiologic Technologist
    • 2+ years of experience as a X-Ray Tech
    • MUST have C-Arm experience
    • Prefer current CPR certification
    • $20+/hour
